author.name: Coh (Hoan Vũ)
about.title: Hello! I'm Hoan Vũ
about.introduce:
Originally from Vietnam, in recent years, I have been honing my skills as a developer, building websites, mobile apps

I strive to create solutions that appeal to users while keeping in mind complex technical dependencies for implementation such as scalability, flexibility, and performance.

I've worked with small teams on small projects and larger development teams with multi-year product lifecycles.

Depending on the team, resources, and product I've worked in multiple roles over the years - holding positions like Front-end Developer, Back-end Developer
